MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 1.15PM in the CH64 postcode area of Burton to allow our engineers to remove trees from our overhead lines. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely possible by 4.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.39PM on 11th March 2021.
